maml:introduction.maml:para: ``` PS C:\> Get-DnsClientGlobalSetting UseSuffixSearchList : True SuffixSearchList : {corp.contoso.com, na.corp.contoso.com} UseDevolution : True DevolutionLevel : 0 ```
This example gets all of the global DNS client settings.

This example gets the connection-specific suffixes. The first item in the list is the primary DNS suffix, if configured.
